SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Advertisement
Advertisement is a class that instantiates the advertisements present in the database using the given file path
AdvertisementDatabase
The AdvertisementDatabase class is responsible for establishing a connection to a database using the provided URL, username, and password.
Announcement
The Announcement class generates and speaks announcements for a given train based on real-time data from CSV files and station information.
DataRetriever
The DataRetriever class is responsible for retrieving data from an external source using an API.
Main
The Main class is the main entry point for the Subway Simulator Screen application.
NewsAPI
The NewsAPI class extends DataRetriever and is responsible for interacting with news data APIs.
NewsProvider
Provides news content by fetching data from a specified endpoint and displaying it in a Swing JPanel.
TrainInfo
This class loads train and station information from the subway.csv file of the newest file in the out folder it then draws them and displays.
WeatherService
Provides the data collected by the WeatherParser class to the GUI
